channel.title: Server keeps restarting / crashing
channel.description:
[code]Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online Exception in thread "Thread-14" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(server.java:148) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)Project SnizzyScape online
ClientHandler was shut down. Project SnizzyScape online[/code]
And a video: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=ve1b48&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=ve1b48&s=3[/url]
That happens everytime I run my server. Any thought?

item.title: Server keeps restarting / crashing
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Looks like you messed something up in the run method in server.java

Read full topic
